(+ $a:\expr $a)
+ 1 + 1
+ x + x
+ x*2 + x*2
- 1 + 2
- x + y
- x*2 + x*3

(+ (+ $a:\string $a) $a)
+ "" + "" + ""
+ "a" + "a" + "a"
- "" + "" + "a"
- "a" + "a"
- "a" + "b" + "c"

(call f $a:\expr \... $a)
+ f(1, x, 1)
+ f("x", "x")
+ f(x, 1, 2, x)
+ f(x+2, 0, x+2)
- f(1, 2)
- f(1, x, 2)
- f(x+2, 0, x+1)
- f("x", "y)

(array [$a:\int][$a] \expr)
+ [10][10]int
+ [16][16]string
+ [8][8]func(int) bool
+ [16][16][]int
+ [16][16][][]int
- [10][16]int
- [16]int
- []int
